verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, the priests <S%G2409><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the captain <S%G4755><s%> of the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%>, came upon <S%G2186><s%> them <S%G846><s%>,

Being grieved <S%G1278><s%> that <S%G1223><s%> they <S%G846><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> preached <S%G2605><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> them in <S%G1519><s%> hold <S%G5084><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the next day <S%G839><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> eventide <S%G2073><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of them which heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the men <S%G435><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>.

¶ And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the morrow <S%G839><s%>, that their <S%G846><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> Annas <S%G452><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Alexander <S%G223><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the kindred <S%G1085><s%> of the high priest <S%G748><s%>, were gathered together <S%G4863><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they had set <S%G2476><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%>, they asked <S%G4441><s%>, By <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, have <S%G4160><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> done <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>?

Then <S%G5119><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Ye rulers <S%G758><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>,

If <S%G1487><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%> be examined <S%G350><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the good deed done <S%G2108><s%> to the impotent <S%G772><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> what means <S%G5101><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> is made whole <S%G4982><s%>;

Be it <S%G2077><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, even by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G5129><s%> doth <S%G3936><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> stand here <S%G3936><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was set at nought <S%G1848><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> builders <S%G3618><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is become <S%G1096><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> the corner <S%G1137><s%>.

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> is there <S%G2076><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> any <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G243><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3777><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be saved <S%G4982><s%>.

¶ Now <S%G1161><s%> when they saw <S%G2334><s%> the boldness <S%G3954><s%> of Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> perceived <S%G2638><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they were <S%G1526><s%> unlearned <S%G62><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ignorant <S%G2399><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, they marvelled <S%G2296><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> they took knowledge <S%G1921><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> they had been <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> beholding <S%G991><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> which was healed <S%G2323><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, they could <S%G2192><s%> say <S%G471><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> against it <S%G471><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when they had commanded <S%G2753><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to go aside <S%G565><s%> out of <S%G1854><s%> the council <S%G4892><s%>, they conferred <S%G4820><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G240><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> shall we do <S%G4160><s%> to these <S%G5125><s%> men <S%G444><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> a notable <S%G1110><s%> miracle <S%G4592><s%> hath been done <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> them <S%G846><s%> is manifest <S%G5318><s%> to all them <S%G3956><s%> that dwell <S%G2730><s%> in Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> we cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> it.

But <S%G235><s%> that <S%G3363><s%> it spread <S%G1268><s%> no <S%G3363><s%> further <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4119><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, let us straitly <S%G547><s%> threaten <S%G546><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, that they speak <S%G2980><s%> henceforth <S%G3371><s%> to no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they called <S%G2564><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and commanded <S%G3853><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to speak <S%G5350><s%> at all <S%G2527><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Whether <S%G1487><s%> it be <S%G2076><s%> right <S%G1342><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to hearken <S%G191><s%> unto you <S%G5216><s%> more than <S%G3123><s%> <S%G2228><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>, judge ye <S%G2919><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%>.

So <S%G1161><s%> when they had further threatened them <S%G4324><s%>, they let <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> go <S%G630><s%>, finding <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might punish <S%G2849><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G1223><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> that which was done <S%G1096><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> above <S%G4119><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years old <S%G2094><s%>, on <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> miracle <S%G4592><s%> of healing <S%G2392><s%> was shewed <S%G1096><s%>.

¶ And <S%G1161><s%> being let go <S%G630><s%>, they went <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> their own company <S%G2398><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> reported <S%G518><s%> all <S%G3745><s%> that the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> had said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they heard that <S%G191><s%>, they lifted up <S%G142><s%> their voice <S%G5456><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with one accord <S%G3661><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Lord <S%G1203><s%>, thou <S%G4771><s%> art God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> hast made <S%G4160><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that in <S%G1722><s%> them is <S%G846><s%>:

Who <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> hast said <S%G2036><s%>, Why <S%G2444><s%> did <S%G5433><s%> the heathen <S%G1484><s%> rage <S%G5433><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> imagine <S%G3191><s%> vain things <S%G2756><s%>?

The kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> stood up <S%G3936><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the rulers <S%G758><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G1909><s%> <S%G846><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> a truth <S%G225><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> child <S%G3816><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> thou hast anointed <S%G5548><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>, were gathered together <S%G4863><s%>,

For to do <S%G4160><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> counsel <S%G1012><s%> determined before <S%G4309><s%> to be done <S%G1096><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3569><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, behold <S%G1896><s%> <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> threatenings <S%G547><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> grant unto <S%G1325><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>, that with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> they may speak <S%G2980><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>,

By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4571><s%> stretching forth <S%G1614><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heal <S%G2392><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> that signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> may be done <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> child <S%G3816><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> had prayed <S%G1189><s%>, the place <S%G5117><s%> was shaken <S%G4531><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> assembled together <S%G4863><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G4130><s%> all <S%G537><s%> filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they spake <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of them that believed <S%G4100><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of one heart <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%>: neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3761><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> any <S%G1520><s%> of them that ought <S%G5100><s%> of the things which he <S%G846><s%> possessed <S%G5224><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> they <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2258><s%> all things <S%G537><s%> common <S%G2839><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> gave <S%G591><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> witness <S%G3142><s%> of the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>: and <S%G5037><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

Neither <S%G3761><s%> <S%G1063><s%> was <S%G5225><s%> there any <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that lacked <S%G1729><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> were <S%G5225><s%> possessors <S%G2935><s%> of lands <S%G5564><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%> sold them <S%G4453><s%>, and brought <S%G5342><s%> the prices <S%G5092><s%> of the things that were sold <S%G4097><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> laid them down <S%G5087><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> the apostles' <S%G652><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> distribution was made <S%G1239><s%> unto every man <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2530><s%> as <S%G302><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5100><s%> <S%G5532><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Joses <S%G2500><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>, (which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, being interpreted <S%G3177><s%>, The son <S%G5207><s%> of consolation <S%G3874><s%>,) a Levite <S%G3019><s%>, and of the country <S%G1085><s%> of Cyprus <S%G2953><s%>,

Having <S%G5225><s%> <S%G846><s%> land <S%G68><s%>, sold <S%G4453><s%> it, and brought <S%G5342><s%> the money <S%G5536><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> it at <S%G3844><s%> the apostles' <S%G652><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>.
